Text: Fantastic upload! works flawlessly! Thank-you for the effort. It is really appriciated!

Thanks for posting this but I can't seem to get it to work. I follow the steps in the txt, but when I install the generated license file, it says "The selected license file appears to be invalid." 

There's also a step 2 that is not mentioned in the txt file, which is a prompt to Upload File to VC download area. I assume you just skip that, but again, I'm getting the "invalid" message after generating the request file and license file. 

A little help would be appreciated. Thanks!
